TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class StateManagedCollection : System.Collections.IList, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StateManagedCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class StateManagedCollection Implements IList, IStateManager
public ref class StateManagedCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 為管理 物件的所有強類型集合，提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for all strongly typed collections that manage objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是所有儲存的強類型集合的基底類別項目，包括， ， ， ，和其他人。The class is the base class for all strongly typed collections that store elements, including , , , , and others. 集合管理自己的狀態，以及它所包含之項目的狀態。The collection manages its own state as well as the state of the elements it contains. 因此，呼叫儲存集合的狀態及目前集合中所包含的所有項目的狀態。Therefore, a call to saves the state of the collection and the state of all the elements currently contained by the collection. 最重要的方法，考慮衍生自類別， ， ， ，和。The most important methods to consider when deriving from the class are , , , , and . 和方法用來儲存檢視狀態中包含的項目類型的索引。The and methods are used to store an index in view state for the type of a contained element. 儲存索引，而不是完整限定的類型名稱，可提升效能。Storing an index rather than a fully qualified type name improves performance. 每當管理集合的項目，會呼叫方法，並驗證根據商務規則項目。The method is called whenever elements of the collection are manipulated, and validates the elements according to business rules. 目前的實作方法禁止`null`物件儲存在集合中; 不過，您可以覆寫這個方法，以定義您自己的驗證行為衍生類型中。Currently, the implementation of the method prohibits `null` objects from being stored in the collection; however, you can override this method to define your own validation behavior in a derived type. 方法會強制將整個集合序列化至檢視狀態，而不是只將序列化狀態在上次變更其載入。The method forces the entire collection to be serialized to view state, rather than just serializing changes made to state since the last time it was loaded. 方法是一種抽象方法，您可以實作以執行此項目層級相同的行為。The method is an abstract method you can implement to perform this same behavior at the element level. > [!IMPORTANT] > 組件限定的存放區類型的檢視狀態中的集合項目名稱。 stores assembly-qualified type names of the collection items in view state. 站台訪客無法解碼的檢視狀態，並擷取型別名稱。A site visitor could decode the view state and retrieve the type name. 如果這種情況下會在您的網站中建立有安全性考量，您可以手動加密的型別名稱，再將它放置在檢視狀態。If this scenario creates a security concern in your Web site, you can manually encrypt the type name before placing it in the view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生強類型的集合類別，從包含物件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a strongly typed collection class from to contain objects. 在此範例中，`CycleCollection`包含執行個體的抽象衍生`Cycle`類別，可以是`Bicycle`或`Tricycle`物件。In this example, the `CycleCollection` is derived to contain instances of the abstract `Cycle` class, which can be either `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` objects. `Cycle`類別會實作介面，因為它會將值儲存`CycleColor`檢視狀態中的屬性。The `Cycle` class implements the interface because it stores the value of the `CycleColor` property in view state. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/CS/statemanagedcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/VB/statemanagedcollectionsample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的陣列必須是相容的類型。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 這些元素會以列舉值逐一查看 集合的相同順序複製到 。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the collection.

span.span: An instance of a class derived from , according to the provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在內部呼叫在實作集合方法。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 衍生的集合覆寫方法傳回的預設執行個體所識別的型別`index`，並對應至所傳回的型別其中方法。Derived collections override the method to return a default instance of the type identified by the provided `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何強型別類別會實作方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the method. `CycleCollection`實作傳回預設執行個體中的其中一個`Bicycle`或`Tricycle`物件，根據傳遞的索引。The `CycleCollection` implementation of returns the default instance of either a `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` object, depending on the index passed. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，驗證 集合的項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, validates an element of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法來驗證透過操作物件實作介面方法。The method is called to validate the object manipulated through the implementation of the interface methods. 預設實作是確認操作的集合的物件不是`null`; 不過，集合會衍生自覆寫方法，以執行任何額外的驗證，例如型別檢查。The default implementation is to verify that the object manipulated by the collection is not `null`; however, collections derived from override the method to perform any additional validation, such as type-checking.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 強制整個 集合序列化至檢視狀態。

span.span: Forces the entire collection to be serialized into view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法強制集合完全序列化 (而方法將儲存的變更資訊)。The method forces the collection to be serialized completely (whereas the method saves only the change information). 當集合已變更的顯著的方式，變更資訊不足以重新建立檢視狀態從記憶體中的物件時，這非常有用。This is useful when a collection has changed in a significant way and change information is insufficient to recreate the object in memory from view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirtyObject(object o) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub SetDirtyObject (o As Object)

param.name: o
param.span: 應該完全序列化自身的 。

span.span: The that should serialize itself completely.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，指示集合中所包含的 ，將其完整狀態 (而不只是變更資訊) 記錄至檢視狀態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, instructs an contained by the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在內部呼叫， ，和方法。The method is called internally by the , , and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何強型別類別會實作抽象方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the abstract method. `CycleCollection`使用物件來儲存其檢視狀態資訊時，並以呼叫委派方法物件。The `CycleCollection` uses a object to store its view-state information, and simply delegates the call to the method of the object. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/CS/statemanagedcollectionsample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/VB/statemanagedcollectionsample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將項目插入位於指定索引處的 集合中。

span.span: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`為-1，`value`附加至開頭集合。If `index` is -1, `value` is appended to the beginning of the collection. 如果`index`等於集合中的項目數`value`附加至集合結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, `value` is appended to the end of the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object) Implements IStateManager.LoadViewState

param.name: savedState
param.span: 物件，代表要還原之集合和集合項目的狀態。

span.span: An object that represents the collection and collection elements' state to restore.

summary.span: 還原先前儲存之 集合和內含 項目的檢視狀態。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the collection and the items it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會還原已儲存的檢視狀態資訊方法。This method restores view-state information that was saved by the method. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。You can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() cil managed
Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來 集合和每個內含 物件的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the collection and each object it contains since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 和內含項目之檢視狀態變更的物件。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the and the items it contains.

returns.span: 如果沒有與集合及其項目關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the collection and its elements, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會傳回至用戶端的 HTML 隱藏項目中所儲存的變數 (``)。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML hidden element (``). 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)和[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and[ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 使得 集合和每個內含 物件追蹤其檢視狀態的變更，以便跨相同頁面要求保存這些變更。

span.span: Causes the collection and each of the objects it contains to track changes to their view state so they can be persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
